net.toddm.cache

Class DefaultLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.toddm.cache.DefaultLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggingProvider

    public class DefaultLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggingProvider
    A simple LoggingProvider implementation that sends log messages to System.out and System.err.
    Author:
    Todd S. Murchison
